title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Reflective Practice Learning for Human-Centered Engineering Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply human-centered design processes to develop prototypes for solving real-world workplace problems.
Learners can systematically analyze their design processes and derive improvement strategies through reflective practice activities.
Learners can evaluate engineering design solutions using mathematical models based on user needs analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
